column4: hi, how to build with module-assistant vmware-server modules ?
how to use module-assistant to build vmware-server modules from vmware-server-kernel-modules-source ? or any hint to the use of module-assistant ..
I did, but the vmware-server modules are not in the list there .. so I'm confused what the right way might be
those vmware server modules, are they a .deb?
nothing. there is no "ubuntu way" for tar.bz2
for m-a you need prepared deb packages
aptitude search vmware-server-kernel-modules-source or like this ..
if it's shown in there, it wokrs, not if not
svladcjelli: in my repo is a package: vmware-server-kernel-source .. I wanna make use of it ..
svladcjelli there must be a reason for buntu people to bring a package like this, and amke a dependency to module assistant .. so I'm just woindering what the idea behind is .. o.O
thats why I asked for a howto or such ..
